report.title: Locations from add square drop-down
report.description: A list of all locations where my sites are returned first. Includes support for limiting results to a certain distance from a post code and also excluding excluded squares, although report can be used for other location types such as events.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lavEx on lavEx.location_id=l.id AND lavEx.location_attribute_id=#excluded_square_attr_id# AND lavEx.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (person_attribute_values pav JOIN person_attributes pa ON pa.id=pav.person_attribute_id AND pa.id=#my_sites_person_attr_id# AND pav.person_id = #user_id# AND pa.deleted=false JOIN people p ON p.id = pav.person_id JOIN users u ON u.person_id = p.id AND u.id = #user_id# ) ON pav.int_value=l.id AND pav.deleted=false WHERE l.deleted=false AND #website_filter# AND (u.id = #user_id# OR u.id IS NULL) AND (lavEx.int_value != 1 OR lavEx.int_value IS NULL) AND ((l.location_type_id IN (#location_type_ids#)) OR ('#location_type_ids#'='-1'))

order_bys.order_by: u.id IS NULL ASC, l.name ASC

param.name: location_type_ids
param.description: Warehouse Ids for the location types you want to limit the report to.

param.name: post_code_geom
param.description: Post code geometry, so we only show squares closest to the user.

param.name: distance_from_post_code
param.description: The distance to return items from the specified post code.

param.name: excluded_square_attr_id
param.description: Id of attribute that holds whether a square is excluded or not. If it is excluded then don't display on the map.
